metadata.name: CyberPunk
metadata.description:
[Art by Steven Messing](https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0582205/)

  The internet is a strange place in the year 2121. Big corporations have been taking advantage of the less fortunate, until a virus invades their servers to steal their wealth and redistribute it to the impoverished. This vigilante virus is capable of morphing itself into human form. Introducing: Cybermello.

  Album: Shockwave

 â™« Fairytale

 Each holder of a CrystalMello token will be invited to join one (1), ninety (90) minute virtual album listening party with Marshmello. In addition, this token is verifiable for:

 - One (1) Signed [Marshmello Authentic Helmet](https://twitter.com/ThisIsAito/status/1395381817071620102)

 - Two (2) Premium Vegas Residency tickets
